levels.description:
The next attack deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage. If it is a ranged attack, splash area is <@ba.vup>increased</>, and an illuminated zone is created for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</> seconds, disabling enemy <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>
<@ba.rem>Can store {cnt} charges</>
